children.text: The pier specified by the engineer has not been located as detailed on the engineering drawings.

As the pier/pile has not been located in the correct position, this area will need to be re-constructed on site to reflect the designed requirements of the approved drawings prior to pouring concrete, or otherwise be re-designed and certified by the original design engineer. The building permit may also need to be amended by the relevant building surveyor to reflect the changes to the approved drawings.
